alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 9:18PM CST until December 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: .OVERVIEW...a around of wintry precipitation will start to spread into parts of northeast Iowa late Thursday afternoon and should reach the Interstate 94 corridor in central Wisconsin in the early morning hours Friday. Mainly snow is expected, but some light freezing rain could mix in at times. This could lead to some light ice accumulations. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THURSDAY TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Parts of north central and northeast Iowa, southeast Minnesota and southwest Wisconsin. * WHEN...From 6 PM Thursday to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation types might change from time to time as this weather system moves through. Watch for changing road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by using 5 1 1 sites online.
